phrase.item: I have climbed up the hill,
And when I look down,
I realize how far I have gone.
Oh, I wail like a nightingale for you.
Hands fragrant from the gilmirvor flower.
Don't come with empty hands,
Going as a guest with empty hands is a shame.
Going as a guest with empty hands is a shame.
Oh, I wail like a nightingale for you.
There are one or two beads.
Every time I remember my mother,
tears are on my face like seven raindrops
Tears are on my face like seven raindrops
Oh, I wail like a nightingale for you.
The stars are twinkling
and my beloved brother went for a journey.
I wonder if my beloved brother is hungry or thirsty
Oh, I wail like a nightingale for you.
I have climbed up the hill,
and when I look down,
I realize how far I have gone.
